left.name: pathological_stage_group
left.description: Specify the tumour stage, based on tumor_staging_system, used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected.

meta.notes: This field depends on the selected pathological staging system, and is only required if the specimen is a tumour.

right.name: pathological_stage_group
right.description: Specify the tumour stage, based on tumor_staging_system, used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected.

notes.data: This field depends on the selected pathological staging system, and is only required if the specimen is a tumour.

left.name: tumour_grade
left.description: Grade of the tumour as assigned by the reporting tumour_grading_system.

meta.notes: This field depends on the selected tumour grading system, and is only required if the specimen is a tumour.

right.name: tumour_grade
right.description: Grade of the tumour as assigned by the reporting tumour_grading_system.

meta.notes: This field depends on the selected tumour grading system.

notes.data: This field depends on the selected tumour grading system.

left.name: cancer_type_code
left.description: The code to represent the cancer type using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2016/en#/) classification.

right.name: cancer_type_code
right.description: The code to represent the cancer type using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2016/en#/) classification.

left.name: chemotherapy_dosage_units
left.description: Indicate units used to record chemotherapy drug dosage.

right.name: chemotherapy_dosage_units
right.description: Indicate units used to record chemotherapy drug dosage.

left.name: hormone_drug_dosage_units
left.description: Indicate the units used to record hormone drug dosage.

right.name: hormone_drug_dosage_units
right.description: Indicate the units used to record hormone drug dosage.
